name: cloudinary-upload-setup
description: NPM packages required for Cloudinary file upload integration

frontend.description: Optional - already included in most Next.js projects
commands: npm install axios (optional, for alternate upload method)

cloudinary.description: Official Cloudinary Node.js SDK for server-side file uploads

multer.description: Express middleware for handling multipart/form-data (file uploads)

step1.title: Install Backend Packages
step1.command: cd lms/backend && npm install cloudinary multer && npm install -D @types/multer
step1.description: Installs Cloudinary SDK and multer middleware in backend

step4.title: Use Component

notes: All packages are production-ready and widely used
No API key or secret is committed to code - use environment variables
Frontend component uses native XMLHttpRequest for progress tracking
Multer stores files in memory before uploading to Cloudinary
All file uploads require authentication and admin role
Maximum file size is 100MB (configurable in backend)
